sentences.sContent: She set up an educational fund in memory of her mother.
sentences.sCn: 她为了纪念她母亲而设立了一个教育基金会。

sentences.sContent: This museum was built in memory of the great writer -Lu Xun.
sentences.sCn: 这个博物馆是为了纪念伟大作家鲁迅而建造的。

sentences.sContent: That year, in memory of a famous politician, the citizen set up a memorial near the Medeiterranean.
sentences.sCn: 那年，为了纪念一名著名的政治家，市民在地中海附近建造了一座纪念碑。

trans.tranOther: intended to show respect and remind people of sb who has died
